text:
@Liz_Cheney You actually believe that Trump wasn't briefed? Look what he's doing to our country! & YES, he IS responsible for the COVID-19 death's & the American soldiers death's.Time to gather your pals & REMOVE him from office. History WILL show ALL "The President's Men"
#ComplicitGOP
